title: Divine noni's protective impact on Swiss albino mice's short-term memory impairment caused by cyclophosphamide: A behavioral and biochemical approach
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Mohammad Ali, Shahid Ud Din Wani, S.N. Manjula, K. Mruthunjaya, Faiyaz Shakeel, Bharathi DR, Sathvik B. Sridhar, Ishfaq Mohiuddin, Reyaz Hassan Mir, Tathagata Dey
